main event: A circular object resembling a bright star was observed moving against the background in Silver Spring, Maryland.
interesting points: The object exhibited intermittent pulsation and a long vertical trail of yellow/white.,The object changed direction from south to north, then west before disappearing below the horizon.,The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes.,Witnesses described the object as extending at least two feet behind it.,The object was evaluated but concluded as a balloon sighting.
sighted object: circular object with a bright star appearance
witness description: civilian engineers, one 34 years old and the other 37 years old, resided in Silver Spring
